medical-record.paragraph:
We may need access to your immigration removal centre medical
records, to make a decision on your claim.
medical-record.paragraph1:
You do not have to agree to give the Home Office this information,
but it would help us to fully consider any medical conditions which
may affect you.
medical-record.li2: medication you are taking or treatment you are receiving
medical-record.response-label1:
You can change your mind at any time by emailing [EMAIL ADDRESS] to tell the Home Office they no longer have permission to
access your medical records.

confirm.submit-warning: You will not be able to change your answers after you submit.
